itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday June 18, 2014
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

In advance of the press conference coming out of the Federal Reserve's two-day meeting, a look at what to expect from Chair Janet Yellen. Plus, more on the debut of the amazon phone. Also, while some criticize the U.S. for not making anything anymore, several fabricators and makers head to Washington, D.C. as part of the 'maker movement.'

"}]
description: What to expect from Chair Yellen's press conference, the amazon phone, and the 'maker movement'
teaser: What to expect from Chair Yellen's press conference, the amazon phone, and the 'maker movement'
contentencoded: In advance of the press conference coming out of the Federal Reserve's two-day meeting, a look at what to expect from Chair Janet Yellen. Plus, more on the debut of the amazon phone. Also, while some criticize the U.S. for not making anything anymore, several fabricators and makers head to Washington, D.C. as part of the 'maker movement.'
title: PODCAST: Guardians of interest rates
